hibernate-mapping.query: select new vw_farmloanreport_ls_dto ( b.Name, b.FatherName, b.Lno, b.VillageDesp, b.LSBusinessDesp, b.LoanProductType, b.GroupNo, b.WithdrawDate, b.ExpireDate, b.IntRate, b.Penalties, b.LoanAmtPerAcre, b.TotalAcre, b.SAmt, b.SourceBr, b.Cur ) from LOMVIW00094 as b where CONVERT(char(10),b.WithdrawDate,111) between CONVERT(char(10),:startDate,111) and CONVERT(char(10),:endDate,111) and b.Cur = :cur and b.SourceBr = :sourceBranchCode and b.LoanType = :loanType and b.Active = true

select new vw_farmloanreport_ls_dto ( b.Name, b.FatherName, b.Lno, b.VillageDesp, b.LSBusinessDesp, b.LoanProductType, b.GroupNo, b.WithdrawDate, b.ExpireDate, b.IntRate, b.Penalties, b.LoanAmtPerAcre, b.TotalAcre, b.SAmt, b.SourceBr, b.Cur ) from LOMVIW00094 as b where CONVERT(char(10),b.WithdrawDate,111) between CONVERT(char(10),:startDate,111) and CONVERT(char(10),:endDate,111) and b.Cur = :cur and b.SourceBr = :sourceBranchCode and b.LSBusinessCode = :businessType and b.LoanType = :loanType and b.Active = true

select new vw_farmloanreport_ls_dto ( b.Name, b.FatherName, b.Lno, b.VillageDesp, b.LSBusinessDesp, b.LoanProductType, b.GroupNo, b.WithdrawDate, b.ExpireDate, b.IntRate, b.Penalties, b.LoanAmtPerAcre, b.TotalAcre, b.SAmt, b.SourceBr, b.Cur ) from LOMVIW00094 as b where CONVERT(char(10),b.WithdrawDate,111) between CONVERT(char(10),:startDate,111) and CONVERT(char(10),:endDate,111) and b.Cur = :cur and b.SourceBr = :sourceBranchCode and b.Active = true

select new vw_farmloanreport_ls_dto ( b.Name, b.FatherName, b.Lno, b.VillageDesp, b.LSBusinessDesp, b.LoanProductType, b.GroupNo, b.WithdrawDate, b.ExpireDate, b.IntRate, b.Penalties, b.LoanAmtPerAcre, b.TotalAcre, b.SAmt, b.SourceBr, b.Cur ) from LOMVIW00094 as b where CONVERT(char(10),b.WithdrawDate,111) between CONVERT(char(10),:startDate,111) and CONVERT(char(10),:endDate,111) and b.Cur = :cur and b.SourceBr = :sourceBranchCode and b.LSBusinessCode = :businessType and b.Active = true
